name: bacds
description: Bitcoin-Addressed Content Delivery System (BACDS) - Revolutionary decentralized content delivery using Bitcoin addresses as network endpoints. Foundation for BitStream and BitNet Infrastructure products on the BitNet network.

scripts.clean-start: npm run kill-electron && sleep 3 && npm start
scripts.clean-dev: npm run kill-electron && sleep 3 && npm run dev
scripts.kill-electron: pkill -9 -f 'node.*electron.*jpeg-renamer' || true; pkill -9 -f 'Electron.*jpeg-renamer' || true; pkill -9 -f 'bacds.*Electron' || true; sleep 1

author: BACDS Team
